LightningComponentBundle.description: A Custom file uploader component the be used in Lightning Out. Since standard component is not supported at the time of development

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record Id
property.description: Record Id of the record where the file is to be uploaded

property.name: buttonLabel
property.label: Button Label
property.description: Label of the file upload button to be displayed

property.name: supportedFileTypes
property.label: Supported File Types
property.description: Comma separated list of file types supported

property.name: navigateNextOnUpload
property.label: Navigate To Next Screen On Upload
property.description: Navigate to next screen on successful file upload

property.name: contentDocumentIds
property.label: Content Document Id
property.description: Content Document Id of the file uploaded
